revised_title: Anniversary Address by Lord Rayleigh: Scientific Achievements and Progress
tldr: In his Anniversary Address, Lord Rayleigh discusses the scientific achievements and progress made by the Royal Society, including the loss of notable fellows, the ongoing research on diseases like sleeping sickness and Malta fever, and the work of the National Physical Laboratory. He also highlights the importance of adequate indexes for the vast scientific literature and expresses gratitude for the financial support provided by Dr. Ludwig Mond.
